title: 20 trains operated this morning, 50 during evening: Railway Dept.
body_lines: Despite the ongoing nationwide hartal, 20 trains were operated in the morning, Sri Lanka Railways media Spokesman A.D.G. Seneviratne said.
He said a number of trains were operated on every line to facilitate commuters to travel to Colombo and are hoping to run 50 trains in the evening.
Accordingly, many trains were operated on the mainline and the coastal line, he said. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
